game.name: Mate'Morphosis
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mate'Morphosis는 잡은 기물로 변신한다는 컨셉을 바탕으로 한 체스 기반의 픽셀 아트 퍼즐 게임입니다. 매 스테이지마다 진화하는 메커니즘에 적응해 보드를 공략하고, 상대 국왕을 끝까지 추격하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mate'Morphosis is a pixel art, chess-inspired puzzle game built around the concept of becoming the piece you capture. Outsmart each board, adapt to evolving mechanics, and hunt down the rival king across every stage.

reviewHighlights.text: Chill puzzle game with clever capture-to-morph mechanics and cute pixel art. Easy to jump in, hard enough to stay engaging. Nice game overall.
Pretty fun game with a twist on chess, and I really like it so far (even though I am not a great chess player at all)! I completed half of the levels...
